title: Multipurpose Project for 1699 Moor High Road
creator: Jacqueline Ellis
description: An overview of who EAEOCS is and their goals with section 16 land. The application lists community partners and their use of the land as well.

title: EAEOCS Community Center PowerPoint
creator: EAEOCS
description: PowerPoint EAEOCS presented to propose their vision and mission with the community center that would be placed in B.L. Moor. This includes the description of who EAEOCS is and what they envision the community center would offer, such as History and Culture, Health and Wellness, Education, Park and Recreation, and property improvement. They go on to express the "Essential Elements" that would be needed for the center to be successful. Lastly, they included the public and private organizations that could benefit from the center.
subject: Education; B.L. Moor; Projects
source: Personal Collection of Jacqueline ellis
